title: Drake, famous for keeping quiet about his son, made a rare post about him on Instagram
text:
CLOSE Stars of new show "Euphoria" - Zendaya, Storm Reid and Hunter Schafer - discuss meeting Drake, who worked as an executive producer on the series. (June 5) AP, AP

Drake has made a rare post about his first-born.

The rapper, who is known for keeping mostly silent about his son Adonis, took to Instagram to wish his kid a happy birthday Friday.

Drake shared a photo of gold-colored birthday decorations, including "ADONIS" spelled out in an arc of balloons. The photo also shows gold-colored spheres and several star-shaped balloons.

"Happy Birthday King," the 32-year-old wrote in the caption.

The "In My Feelings" artist has had quite a history when it comes to his relationship with his son.

In 2018, rapper Pusha T released a diss track titled "The Story of Adidon" in which he claimed that Drake is hiding a secret child he had with Sophie Brussaux, a former porn star.

'Adonis > Picasso don’t @ me': Drake thinks his son Adonis paints better than Pablo Picasso

More: Drake is 'so hurt' after father's accusations: 'Truth is hard for some people to accept'

Drake confirmed he did indeed father a son named Adonis with the release of his album "Scorpion" in June 2018. On one track, "Emotionless," Drake raps: "I wasn't hidin' my kid from the world, I was hidin' the world from my kid."

Contributing: Rasha Ali

description: Though the rapper is famous for keeping mostly quiet about his son Adonis, Drake couldn't resist wishing his kid a happy birthday on Instagram.
